Name: glomangioma
Definition: A hemangiopericytic tumor that is a mesenchymal neoplasm composed of cells that closely resemble the modified smooth muscle cells of the normal glomus body.

Name: obsolete skin compound nevus
Definition: A hemangiopericytic tumor that is a mesenchymal neoplasm composed of cells that closely resemble the modified smooth muscle cells of the normal glomus body.

Name: glomangiomatosis
Definition: A benign perivascular tumor that is characterized as a vascular variant of a glomus tumor.
Synonym: pediatric carcinoma of the Liver cell

Name: glomangiomyoma
Definition: A papillary carcinoma that is located_in the penis.
Synonym: recurrent Urothelial carcinoma of the renal Pelvis and Ureter

Name: obsolete medullary carcinoma with amyloid stroma
Definition: A papillary carcinoma that is located_in the penis.
Synonym: Parafollicular cell carcinoma with Amyloid Stroma
